mapper.insert: insert into af_ipinfo(ip, area, area_id, city, city_id, country, country_id, county, county_id, isp, isp_id, region, region_id, visit_time) values(#{ip}, #{area}, #{area_id}, #{city}, #{city_id},#{country},#{country_id},#{county},#{county_id},#{isp},#{isp_id},#{region},#{region_id},now())
